objects.text: Vibrant RGB LEDs • 60hrs Playback • BEAST™ Mode

product_details.name: boAt Rockerz 480 w/RGB LEDs, 6 Light Modes, 40mm Drivers, Beast Mode, 60hrs Playback, ENx Tech, BT v5.3, Adaptive Fit & Easy Access Controls, Bluetooth Headphones(Black Sabre)
product_details.description: Noise Control: Sound Isolation. Headphones Jack: No Jack. Model Name: Rockerz 480. Connectivity Technology: Bluetooth. Wireless Communication Technology: Bluetooth. Specific Uses For Product: Gaming. Charging Time: 1.5 Hours. Compatible Devices: smartphone, laptop. Item Weight: 120 g. Water Resistance Level: Water Resistant. Frequency Range: 20Hz-20KHz. Net Quantity: 1 Piece. Control Method: Touch. Number of Items: 3. Battery Life: 60 Hours. Audio Driver Type: Dynamic Driver. Bluetooth Range: 10 Metres. Bluetooth Version: 5.3. Earpiece Shape: Over Ear. Model: Rockerz 480. Product Dimensions: 6 x 2 x 5 cm; 120 g. Batteries: 1 Lithium Polymer batteries required. (included). Special Features: Blazing RGB LEDs with 6 Modes, BEAST™ Mode, 60 hours of Playback, Type-C Interface. Batteries Included: Yes. Batteries Required: Yes. Battery cell composition: Lithium Polymer. Includes Rechargeable Battery: Yes. Country of Origin: China. Importer: Imagine Marketing Limited Unit no. 204 & 205, 2nd floor, D-wing & E-wing, Corporate Avenue, Andheri Ghatkopar Link Road Mumbai Mumbai City MH 400093 IN. Item Dimensions Lx Wx H: 6 x 2 x 5 Centimeters. Generic Name: Headphones.

banner_details:
This vibrant, tech-inspired banner is designed to promote an audio product, with a futuristic aesthetic and strong visual hierarchy. The background features a dark grid illuminated with neon radial and linear gradients, giving a digital/techno vibe. The central visual focus is on the product image (`product_image`), which is prominently placed in the center.

The headline (`heading`) is bold and white, grabbing immediate attention, followed by a subheading (`subheading`) in a cyan neon hue, enhancing the futuristic tone. Below the product image, the feature list (`description`) provides brief product highlights, styled in white.

A bold magenta price highlight (`price`) is centered prominently, acting as a visual anchor. Below this, a purple rounded-rectangle button (`cta_button`) with white call-to-action text (`cta`) completes the layout, urging user interaction.

**Color Palette:**
- Background: #0E0E14 (deep black)
- Cyan Accent: #00FCFF
- Magenta: #FF007B
- Purple: #7B00FF
- White: #FFFFFF

This layout effectively combines modern typography, a neon glow aesthetic, and strong product focus for a dynamic promotional impression.
product_color: The product image features a sleek black headset accented with a vibrant RGB ring, making black (#1A1A1A) the primary base color exuding sophistication and modernity. The matte black is contrasted with subtle glossy black highlights (#2E2E2E), enhancing depth. The RGB lighting starts with a radiant magenta (#FF2EDB) transitioning into a vivid pink (#FF3C7E) and finally a fiery red-orange (#FF512F), creating a dynamic neon glow. These neon tones seamlessly blend into the dark surface while still standing out, giving the product a futuristic and gamer-centric vibe. A suitable color palette for an advertisement includes #1A1A1A, #FF2EDB, #FF3C7E, and #FF512F.
